attributes.title: Ewww
attributes.review: I honestly do not agree with this horrible app. 🤢I saw the pumpkin 🎃 patch man and got very scared ...and then it just doesn’t give good advice 😥...the orange man is bad he is terrible this app deserves to be off the App Store before he scares anyone else 🤢he said “Make America Great Again”🤢🤮ewwww he disgust me he’s racism and is very scary please take this app down...eww😰ima have nightmares me and my pet rat

attributes.title: Worst app ever created
attributes.review: This app is just terrible, I downloaded it and as soon as I opened it I puked on my phone. I then had to put it in rice to dry it off. Another thing was as soon as I deleted the app it completely deleted all my other apps with it. Extremely disappointed. P.S Please never vote for trump or you’ll be kissed by Shane Dawson.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE! MUST BE REMOVED
attributes.review: I’m am so disgusted by this app. I downloaded it because my white republican father told be it would be useful but the second I opened the app a big fat Cheeto popped up and told me I had to vote for him or my phone would explode! Naturally I deleted the app and thankfully my phone is fine. This is a danger to others and this app must be removed!

attributes.title: This app called me the n-word
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn about our President, but was deeply offended when I opened it to hear the n-word being spoken so clearly over and over. Not only that but my phone locked me out everytime I liked a blm post on any platform of social media. Wow. Not what I was expecting. I am very offended by this app

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Ok so basically I woke up this morning to a text from my mom saying trump was coming to pick me up because she sold me to him for money😨. Anyways as I was in the car on my way to the location he was taking me he told me I needed to build the wall or else I’ll die😓. 0/10 do not recommend getting sold to trump 🙅🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: completely inappropriate
attributes.review: i mean come on guys for one of the worst presidents we’ve ever had at least have a somewhat bearable app. Complete waste of time and the terrifying orange oompa loompa that harasses my eyes when i first open it is completely unnecessary. please do everyone a favor and never try anything like this again❤️

attributes.title: Um, no thanks
attributes.review: I went to the bakery with my pet dinosaur named Jesus the homewrecker, and while sitting down I opened the app and my phone went sprinting across the store! 😡😡I couldn’t believe it. The app remotely removed my leash from my pets collar and ate it! I was so upset! And to top it all off, it said, “frosted flakey time,” and then ATE Jesus! 😡😡😡 this app is worth no more than one star.

attributes.title: DISGUSTANG
attributes.review: ok so as soon as i downloaded the app i got a text from 6ix9ine saying he wants my toes💀 and then i opened it and got an immediate virus and spam of Trumps small pepe. i was appalled at the amount of disrespect that was given to me. a woman. who was trying to sUpPoRt trump but got trashed on instead. Good news trump. you lost a voter. ✨🐸 o wait u didnt even have my vote in the first place

attributes.title: Not good....
attributes.review: This app is not good whatsoever. As soon as i opened it the layout was absolutely terrible and not good for my eyes. I don’t understand why i have to put my phone number in but its whatever. Also, i don’t understand why they put a picture of a cheeto with a wig on instead of the “president”? very immature choice to me.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE 😣
attributes.review: I opened this app and my eyes IMMEDIATELY broke. I’m writing this with speech to text due to my eyes being ruined. Too many disgusting pictures of a Cheeto occasionally naked 😭🤮. I threw up several times in the first few minutes and even had to go to the hospital! Horrific and no one ever has to experience this app again 🤢.
